title: Touch 3: Kimi ga Toorisugita Ato ni - Don't Pass Me By
synopsis: Compilation movie of the third year of the Touch timeline. Contain many important plot differences, added scenes and the complete removal of an important character.
characters: ['Uesugi, Tatsuya', 'Asakura, Minami', 'Harada, Shouhei', 'Kashiwaba, Eijirou', 'Punch', 'Uesugi, Kazuya', 'Matsudaira, Koutarou', 'Uesugi, Haruko', 'Kashiwaba, Eiichirou', 'Nitta, Akio']
